{modest maps}

Manual

API

  • - Point
  • - Location
  • - Coordinate

Location

Location is a geographical latitude and longitude, expressed as a simple pair of numbers. For example, San Francisco is near 37°N, 122°W or new com.modestmaps.Location(37, -122).

API

Constructor

new com.modestmaps.Location(lat, lon)

Class Methods

com.modestmaps.Location.distance(l1, l2, r)

com.modestmaps.Location.interpolate(l1, l2, f)
